item.description:
Havana Club is one of the more popular spots for Salsa in the city. Its main attraction is the atmosphere it offers - dance (and not drink) focused for the experienced, and support and encouragement for the beginners. The music is good, the crowd is welcoming and the setting is casual and inexpensive.

Where: Central Square
When: 9:00pm (lesson at 9:00, open dancing at 10:00)
Cost: $12 (including lessons)
Info: http://havanaclubsals...
Reviews: http://www.yelp.com/b...

FYI, there's a "Salsa 101 / Rueda" lesson at 8:00pm, which you're welcome to attend. The "Beginner Salsa" lesson begins at 9:00.
item.name: Friday Night Salsa
